WordsBankItems.Name: could very well
WordsBankItems.Body:
вполне может + verb

It could very well be. Это вполне может быть.
It rides beautifully and could very well be taken on the road.
To do otherwise could very well cost you your life.

WordsBankItems.Name: You would not even think of
WordsBankItems.Body: You would not even think of approaching the monarch without first receiving his permission.

WordsBankItems.Name: a matter
WordsBankItems.Body: You want to speak to the king of the land about a matter.

WordsBankItems.Name: cost
WordsBankItems.Body:
It cost me a lot of time.
To do otherwise could very well cost you your life.
